name: aiblocker
description: Blocks AI summaries in Google Search.

scripts.build:firefox: cpr src/common dist/firefox -o && cpr src/firefox/manifest.json dist/firefox/manifest.json -o
scripts.build:chrome: cpr src/common dist/chrome -o && cpr src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/manifest.json -o
scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.ship: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome
